name: Rooftop Running
description:
A simple ninja platforming game. I made this as my final piece of assessment for the first trimester. Not that great, I know, but it works. I really want to go back and redo some of it in the future when I've learned more. Remake it, essentially. 

You have to move to the left chasing after a group of ninjas who stole the secret scrolls. Pick up the scrolls lying along the path to become stronger. Defeat the ninjas for daring to do such a thing.
